nodes.text: The Perkell sector was a sector located within the Mid Rim. The sector largely consisted of a string of unimportant industrial planets strung along an offshoot of the Perlemian Trade Route and connected to clusters of agricultural and mining planets. The sector's capital was located on Trancret. The Perkell Sector Mining Fleecing was pulled off by the Red & Black League of Herstell V.
